page.title: 10Cycling in Seagry.
page.content: Everybody in our class has a bike of their own.There are lots of different kinds of bike in our class.They're mostly shopping and BMX's but there are four people who have racers.The colours vary a lot mostly blue.The spokes are mostly metal but some BMX ones have plastic spokes.Every bike has reflectors on their pedals and most of them have them on the back. Lots of the shopping bikes have bells on them.BMX bikes are used for performing stunts and so they have specially strong front forks.Shopping bikes are designed to be more comfortable and have a basket on the front and a saddle bag behind the saddle.Fifty per cent of the parents of children in our class also ride a bicycle at least once a week.We have used our bicycles whilst collecting some of the information in the survey.
